game.name: GameShop Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Run a GameShop set in the early 2000's. Manage your products for sale such as games, consoles, and accessories. Customize your store and your character to make it your own. Play solo or enjoy up to a 4 player co-op and run the store your way.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Run a GameShop set in the early 2000's. Manage your products for sale such as games, consoles, and accessories. Customize your store and your character to make it your own. Play solo or enjoy up to a 4 player co-op and run the store your way.
